A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The best thing about The Last Jedi is that it surprised me. While early on\, it hinted at being a \"soft-remake\" of Empire (similar to the TFA & New Hope)\, thankfully TLJ took a very different turn and told some very different stories.  This meant that the audience didn't really know what to expect\, which characters would turn\, and who would make it out alive. I was really happy that the took some risks\, even though they all didn't pay off\, as it made for a much more thrilling movie.
